publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2593 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Bail Conditions (Specification of Devices) and Restriction of Liberty Order (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2005 (SSI 2005/142).
